resources.string: This service is aimed at detecting attack scenarios using social engineering methods by analysing content.\nThe information collected by this service is processed locally and is not transmitted to third parties

SEADA - Social Engineering Attacks Detection App. This application is aimed at detecting attempts by attackers to launch a social engineering attack on a user\'s device.\nThese methodologies contain vectors of attacks using scam, phishing, etc.\nThe application ensures its performance by evaluating the content with which the user interacts. Any information gathered in the process is not shared externally.
Enable Detection Service in Accessibility to continue
Make SEADA the default browser for full functionality
Analyse an online resource for phishing attempts…
Analyse a call for scam attempt
You may be subject to the actions of malicious people.\nThe text below contains suspicious information or is a phishing scam

string-array.name: features_descriptions
string-array.item: This system detects possible suspicious messages before you interact with them
Alerting the user of a threat if the user has already fallen under an attack vector
Detecting deliberately false messages and warning the user about them
The software can detect phishing sites and report them to the user
The application works in the background without distracting the user
